title: Mount&BladeWithFireAndSword Update 1.43-SKIDROW
description:
My First Torrent:

This is Mount And Blade Upgrade from 1138 to 1143

This patch includes the skidrow folder that includes the crack for the game aswell as the patcher to obviously install the patch.

I extracted these files from the torrent in the link as they were .r00 files.

This Patch also lets you play multiplayer again and the graphics fix that had occured in the previous update!

I Have scanned this torrent myself and it said it was safe : I USE AVAST!

I hope you guys enjoy this torrent as it took some time to make!
